Contact.name: Name
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.message: Tell us about your event participation and motivation

cultural.title: Cultural Dialogue
cultural.content: This cultural event project brings together individuals from different cultures living in the Netherlands, helping them get to know each other better. Participants explore each other’s worlds through cultural traditions, glimpses of daily life, and personal stories. This interactive project aims to create meaningful dialogues between communities through art, music, conversations, and shared experiences.

collaborate.title: Project Partners
collaborate.content: The Harmonie van Nederland project is a joint project of the Sanat Foundation and the Freedom Combination Foundation. The work will be organized by the Lotus van de Media platform within Freedom Combination.

platform.title: Cultural Meeting Point
platform.content: We offer a space where participants can showcase their cultural heritage. This platform, featuring music, dance, stage performances, and singing acts, fosters cultural interaction and strengthens social bonds. Additionally, the archiving of cultural heritage in both digital and physical spaces contributes to passing it on to future generations.

activities.title: Cultural Activities
activities.content: We organize various events to increase cultural diversity and strengthen interaction between communities in Dutch society. Through music and dance performances, stage acts, art exhibitions, and talks, participants have the opportunity to closely experience different cultures. Each event emphasizes the unique values of cultures, encouraging mutual understanding and respect.

collaborate.title: Project Partners
collaborate.content: The Harmonie van Nederland project is a joint initiative of the Sanat Foundation and the Freedom Combination Foundation. The activities will be organized by the Lotus van de Media platform under Freedom Combination.

unity.title: Cultural Unity
unity.content: We develop projects that celebrate the cultural diversity of the Netherlands and promote social harmony. By creating collaboration and dialogue environments between different cultures, we aim to strengthen social peace. Through the preservation and sharing of cultural heritage, we contribute to the construction of a more inclusive and understanding society.

privacy.content: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. When you visit our website, you consent to the processing of your personal data.
